column1: '''''Michael Silverman Catalogue 23''''' is a dealer's catalogue from [http://www.michael-silverman.com/ Michael Silverman Literary & Historical Manuscripts] (London). The description of item 98 includes extracts from  [[Letter to Deirdre Levinson (26 June 1957)
